means: （给词、短语等）下定义，构成释义

sentence.Network_en: Please listen while I define your duties.
sentence.Network_cn: 在我规定你的职责时,请仔细听好.
请准确地解释这些字的意义.

sentence.Network_en: It's hard to define exactly what has changed.
sentence.Network_cn: 很难解释清楚到底发生了什么变化.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (also in the sense 'bring to an end'): from Old French definer, from a variant of Latin definire, from de- (expressing completion) + finire 'finish' (from finis 'end')

encyclopedia.content: #define中的 #与## #define GPEBLT_FUNCNAME(basename) (SCODE (GPE::*)(struct GPEBltParms *))&GPE::##basename 在#define中，标准只定义了#和##两种操作。#用来把参数转换成字符串，##则用来连接两个前后两个参数，把它们变成一个字符串。 #include <stdio.h> #define paster( n ) printf( "token " #n" = %d\n ", token##n ) int main() { int token9=10; paster(9); return 0; } 输出为[leshy

entry.def: If you define something, you show, describe, or state clearly what it is and what its limits are, or what it is like.

example.ex: We were unable to define what exactly was wrong with him...
example.tran: 我们说不清楚他到底哪里不对劲。

example.ex: He was asked to define his concept of cool.
example.tran: 他被要求说明自己关于“酷”的定义。

entry.def: If you define a word or expression, you explain its meaning, for example in a dictionary.

example.ex: When people are asked 'What is intelligence?' they tend to reply: 'I don't know how to define it, but I can certainly recognize it when I see it.'...
example.tran: 当被问及“智力是什么”的时候，人们往往会回答说：“我不知道该如何定义它，但我见到了肯定就能认得出。”

example.ex: Collins English Dictionary defines a workaholic as 'a person obsessively addicted to work'.
example.tran: 《柯林斯英语词典》给“工作狂”一词下的定义是“一个过分沉溺于工作中的人”。

means.word_mean: 1. give a definition for the meaning of a word;
4. delineate the form or outline of;

sentences.sentence: "The tree was clearly defined by the light"
"The camera could define the smallest object"

stems_affixes.type_exp: =limit,boundary,end 表示"结束,范围,界限,限制"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 被限制的, 狭窄的, 分娩的
stems_affixes.word_buile: confine[v.限制;使不外出,禁闭n.[n.]界限,范围]+ed……的→adj.被限制的, 狭窄的, 分娩的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 确切的,权威性的;最后的,决定性的
stems_affixes.word_buile: define[v.给……下定义;阐述;阐释;限定,规定]+itive……的→规定了的,决定了的
fine范围,限制→[罚款]以约束,限制

stems_affixes.value_cn: 给……下定义;阐述;阐释;限定,规定

stems_affixes.word_buile: fine范围,限制→[罚款]以约束,限制

Sentence.sentence: If that's how we're defining digital textbooks, there's no hope of that becoming a mainstream product.
Norms define how people " ought" to behave under particular circumstances in a particular society.
Excessive Internet use should be defined not by the number of hours spent online but "in terms of losses," said Maressa Orzack, a Harvard University professor.
As Yale law professor Anne Alstott argues, justifying parental support depends on defining the family as a social good that, in some sense, society must pay for.
But try to imagine our world as well without the remarkable works that have defined our culture and values.
Humanistic thinking helps define our culture and values.

sentences.cn: 请准确地解释这些字的意义。

sentences.en: They defined him as a rogue.
Please listen while I define your duties.
sentences.cn: 在我规定你的职责时, 请仔细听好。

sentences.en: The powers of a judge are defined by law.
sentences.cn: 法官的权限是由法律规定的。

sentences.en: It's hard to define exactly what has changed.
sentences.cn: 很难解释清楚到底发生了什么变化。

means.word_mean: 给(词、短语等)下定义；解释(词义等)；阐述

sentences.en: They disagreed on how to define “liberal”.
sentences.cn: 他们对如何解释“liberal”一词的词义有不同意见。

means.word_mean: 说明(事物)的性质(或本质)，明确(事物)的范围和性质；详述，描述

sentences.en: This booklet defines the committee's functions.
sentences.cn: 这本小册子说明该委员会的职能。

jushi.english: The mountain was clearly defined against the eastern sky.
jushi.chinese: 那山被东方的天际衬托着,轮廓分明。

jushi.english: Some words are hard to define because they have many different usages.
jushi.chinese: 有些单词因有许多不同的用法而难以下定义。
我说不出这个字的准确意思。
